Author: unravellingmagic
Text: And this right here is proof that no one chooses to have an ED. It happens to us and that's out of our control. I know it's easier said than done but please try to see your ED as something seperate from you and your personality. No matter the shitty and horrible things your ED makes you do, underneath it all you're still the same beautiful person. Keep fighting on ❤️

Author: wallflowerbitca
Text: I read a book when I was 10 about a girl with an eating disorder. I vowed i would never do something that “stupid” to lose weight. Less than a year later I developed my ED.
